participant_1.background:
I've been hiding my financial troubles from my parents.
i am a truck driver in the south.
i met my husband when i was a freshman in college.
i worry about money even though i m in high school.
My vintage cars are my pride and joy.

participant_2.background:
I do yoga and write in my journal to stay healthy.
I would brag about my unique life story and how I managed to find success despite all the challenges I've faced.
i think i m fabulous.
I'm always ready to defend myself, but I'm also a big fan of comedy.
we live in a rural area.

content.text: Hello! How are you doing today?
Hello! I'm doing great! How about yourself?
I'm doing pretty well, thank you! I'm a truck driver in the south, and I love my job.
That's awesome! I'm a writer, and I also love my job.
That's great! What kind of writing do you do?
I'm a blogger, and I write about my life and my experiences. I also write about yoga and health.
That's so cool! I've always wanted to learn how to do yoga.
It's really easy to learn! You can find lots of free yoga videos online.
I'll have to check that out! I'm always looking for ways to stay healthy.
That's great! I'm glad to hear that.
So, what's your favorite thing to do in your free time?
I love to read, and I also love to go hiking.
That's awesome! I love to read too, but I don't get to do it as much as I would like.
I know what you mean! I'm always trying to find time to read.
So, where do you live?
I live in a rural area in the south.
Oh, cool! I live in a city in the south.
That's awesome! I've always wanted to live in a city.
It's definitely different from living in a rural area.
I bet! I'm sure it's more exciting.
It can be, but it can also be overwhelming.
I can imagine
